channel.title: Happy Hurricane Season!
channel.description:
[img]http://www.wtdc.com/images/hurricane_flag.gif[/img] [hr]
12-18 Named Storms 6-10 Hurricanes 3-6 Major Hurricanes
[hr] Weee They say it will be a very active season, so we will see I hope we get some nice wind for wind surfing. [hr] Hurricane names this year:
Arlene Bret Cindy Don Emily Franklin Gert Harvey Irene Jose Katia Lee Maria Nate Ophelia Philippe Rina Sean Tammy Vince Whitney
[hr]

item.title: Happy Hurricane Season!
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:34, topic:397371”]Im in florida now, just moved, storms every night cant wait for the hurricanes :D[/quote] welcome to the sunshine state!!! Where we are the lighting capital of the states…There is something wrong there o.o

item.title: Happy Hurricane Season!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:23, topic:397371”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=494515.msg3616164#msg3616164 date=1306981763]

Hmmm, a tornado just destroyed my city(Not a joke). Tell me if you see it on the news(Springfield, MA).

0.0 sucks ima go watch the news now lol.
Anything happen to u?
I also have a question… Why does it say “Happy Huricane season”? its not so happy for some ppl lol.

I’m fine, but I’m lucky because everything around me is destroyed. No school tomorrow though

Er… not to be a smart alec or anything… but then how are you on an computer/internet? :o
[/quote]he is at a friends house from what he told me on msn.

hm…

but then how are you on an computer/internet? :o

I still don’t get that :o.
Unless he is in an completely different area…[/quote]

I have wireless internet and I’m at my friends house in a different state. Lol.(He also has wireless internet so I could connect)

@Loveandpower good boy, cookies for you.

Read full topic
